Def.Name: Guard_LeiBu_1
Def.Desc: The protection method that controls the power of thunder, enshrinement can comprehensively increase various abilities, and additionally increase the skill level of magic weapon, magic power, but it will reduce the magic aura's recovery speed.

Def.Name: Guard_LeiBu_2
Def.Desc: The protection method that controls the power of lightning, enshrinement can comprehensively increase various abilities, and additionally increase the skill level of the magic weapon. The magic aura's recovery speed, but it will reduce the magic power.

Def.Name: Guard_LeiBu_3
Def.Desc: The method of protection that controls the power of the cloud and wind, enshrinement can slightly increase various abilities and increase the skill level of the body, but it will reduce the magic power.

Def.Name: Guard_LeiBu_4
Def.Desc: The protection method that controls the power of rain and thunder, enshrinement can slightly increase various abilities and increase the skill level of the body protection, but it will reduce the magic aura's recovery speed.

Def.Name: Guard_LeiBu_5
Def.Desc: One of the five envoys of the Mine Ministry, enshrinement can increase the maximum life and aura, and increase the magic power, magic aura, and magic aura recovery speed.

Def.Name: Guard_LeiBu_6
Def.Desc: One of the five minions of the mine, enshrining can increase the maximum life and aura, and increase the magic power, but it will reduce the shield strength.

Def.Name: Guard_LeiBu_7
Def.Desc: One of the five minions of the Thunder Ministry, enshrinement can increase the maximum life and aura, and increase the magic power, magic power, and magic cost.

Def.Name: Guard_LeiBu_8
Def.Desc: One of the five minions of the mine, enshrinement can increase the maximum life and aura, and increase the skill level of the weapon, the skill level of the spell, and the skill level of the body.

Def.Name: Guard_LeiBu_9
Def.Desc: One of the five minions of the Mine Ministry, enshrinement can greatly increase the life span and maximum aura.

Def.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_1
Def.Desc: The first of the eight tribes, enshrinement can greatly improve all abilities, and learn the supernatural power: the view of the mind.

Def.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_2
Def.Desc: Among the eight lords who control the ocean beings, enshrining can increase all abilities in small amounts, and acquire the skill: Royal Dragon Roar, and additionally increase the skill level and power of the spell, but it will double the cost of the spell.

Def.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_3
Def.Desc: Among the eight tribes, the king of agility and covert protection, enshrined can increase various abilities in a small amount, and acquires the mana: Yasha blood curse, and additionally increases the mana power, mana consumption, reduces mana chanting time, and adjusts his breath. time.

Def.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_4
Def.Desc: Among the eight tribes, the protection of the change of 缥缈, enshrining can increase various abilities in a small amount, and additionally increase the speed of magic aura recovery and reduce the consumption of magic aura.

Def.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_5
Def.Desc: 八部众之中代表杀戮恶念之护法，供奉可少量提高各项能力，习得术法：修罗剑，并额外提高战斗技能等级，御器技能等级，术法技能等级，护体技能等级。

Def.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_6
Def.Desc: 八部众之中代表神威庄严之护法，供奉可少量提高各项能力，并额外提高御器飞行速度，法宝速度，法宝转弯速度。

Def.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_7
Def.Desc: 八部众之中代表美好宁静之护法，供奉可少量提高各项能力，习得术法：宁静，并额外提高魅力，寿命，灵气最大值。

Def.Name: Guard_BaBuZhong_8
Def.Desc: 八部众之中代表地表众生之王，供奉可少量提高各项能力，并额外提高护盾技能等级，护盾强度。

Def.Name: Guard_YouMing_1
Def.Desc: 幽冥世界掌管生死之护法，供奉可提高所有能力，并获得神通：阴阳逆转，额外提高护御技能等级，灵气最大值。

Def.Name: Guard_YouMing_2
Def.Desc: 幽冥世界勾魂使，供奉可少量提高所有能力，习得术法：无常之护，并额外提高御器技能等级，法宝威力，法宝灵气，法宝灵气恢复速度。

Def.Name: Guard_YouMing_3
Def.Desc: 幽冥世界勾魂使，供奉可少量提高所有能力，并额外提高术法技能等级，术法威力，术法消耗。

Def.Name: Guard_YouMing_4
Def.Desc: 幽冥世界巡查者，供奉可少量提高所有能力，并额外提高护盾强度，法宝威力。

Def.Name: Guard_YouMing_5
Def.Desc: 幽冥世界巡查者，供奉可少量提高所有能力，并额外提高护盾强度，术法威力。

Def.Name: Guard_YouMing_6
Def.Desc: 幽冥世界冥河引渡人，供奉可提高寿命和灵气最大值，并额外获得神通：还魂术，额外提高法宝威力，术法威力。

Def.Name: Guard_YouMing_7
Def.Desc: 幽冥世界阴山守卫者，供奉可提高寿命和灵气最大值，并额外提高护盾强度。

Def.Name: Guard_Other_1
Def.Desc: 星宿之灵，凶煞非常，供奉会提高所有能力，并额外提升法宝威力，法术威力，但会大幅降低寿命。
